data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Kaduna. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kaduna, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Kaduna that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Kaduna to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Kaduna, Nigeria find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bauchi people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bauchi people.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Kaduna access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Kaduna, Nigeria.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Kaduna, Nigeria has a population of 6,849,100.

We estimate Kaduna has 1,764,493 people who might know Jesus, 1,742,918 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,341,690 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 1,764,493 believers in Kaduna to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
